sentences.sContent: Lifeguard driving a sampan came to church with the priest said: "Father, come as soon as possible on!
sentences.sContent_eng: Lifeguard driving a sampan came to church with the priest said: "Father, come as soon as possible on!
sentences.sCn: 一个救生员驾着舢板来到教堂，跟神父说：“神父，赶快上来吧！

sentences.sContent: I saw a thirty-foot sampan [boat] that had been lifted neatly on top of the roof of a prostrated house.
sentences.sContent_eng: I saw a thirty-foot sampan [boat] that had been lifted neatly on top of the roof of a prostrated house.
sentences.sCn: 我看到一个30英尺长的小船被冲到了坍塌了的房顶上。

trans.tranOther: a small boat used in China and Southeast Asia
